1309290.name: Shadow of Valhalla
1309290.description:
Shadow of Valhalla is a visceral physics-based VR combat game set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers.
Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!
  • Immersive gameplay and story-based agency.
  • Stunning visuals, magical spells and extreme gore
  • Dynamic enemy AI & physics-based combat
  • Endless gameplay with progressive difficulty
  • Cutting-edge weapon interaction system
  • Player controls inspired by Half-Life: Alyx
  • Mixed-Reality tools and haptic accessory support

"The halls of the slain, glorious Valhalla.
The ultimate reward for those who die in battle.
Combat echos in the souls of ancient warriors throughout eternity.
Prepare for Ragnarök, the twilight of the gods,
..and the end of all existence."
-Odin
1309290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
